title: STAT+: FDA halts gene therapy trials after brain tumor found in patient
description: FDA paused trials for two experimental gene therapies from Regenxbio after one child developed a brain tumor.
content: FDA paused trials for two experimental gene therapies from Regenxbio after one child developed a brain tumor.
